rooms.name: Parlour
rooms.description: You enter the parlour with beautiful artworks across the walls
rooms.long_description: Elegant floral-patterned wallpaper adorns the walls, and plush, velvety furniture sits under dim chandeliers. Sunlight filters through heavy drapes, casting a nostalgic glow on antique coffee tables and forgotten magazines, capturing the essence of vintage sophistication

rooms.name: First Floor Hallway
rooms.description: You see the long First Floor Hallway, you feel something is watching you
rooms.long_description: A narrow path unfolds beneath a classic chandelier. A muted color palette adorns the walls, complementing the aged hardwood floor. Closed doors line the passage, veiling the history within. The faint ticking of a grandfather clock adds a timeless rhythm to the hushed ambiance.

rooms.name: Ballroom
rooms.long_description: The ballroom in the mansion, a grand space frozen in elegance. '80s opulence exudes from gilded moldings and crystal chandeliers. A parquet dance floor reflects a history of waltzes, while long-forgotten echoes linger.

rooms.name: Kitchen
rooms.description: You enter the kitchen and you smell wonderful food, but nothing is cooking
rooms.long_description: Formica countertops bear witness to culinary tales, while a vintage refrigerator hums softly. Utensils hang from a pegboard, and a retro clock keeps time over a worn, checkered floor.

rooms.name: Dining Room
rooms.description: You see the dining room, you hear the laughs and cheers of people, but no one is here
rooms.long_description: The mansion's dining room, a timeless tableau of sophistication. An ornate '80s chandelier illuminates a polished mahogany table, draped in a lace runner. High-backed chairs await, surrounded by walls adorned with classic artwork.

rooms.name: Second Floor Hallway
rooms.description: You enter the second floor hallway as the old floor creeks
rooms.long_description: Ascending the grand staircase, the second-floor hallway unfolds in the mansion. '80s floral wallpaper lines the corridor, complementing the plush carpet underfoot. Antique sconces cast a soft glow, revealing closed doors that guard the secrets of rooms past.

rooms.name: Library
rooms.description: You see a Library with bookshelves as far as the eye can see
rooms.long_description: The mansion's library, a sanctuary of knowledge frozen in time. Mahogany bookshelves reach toward a coffered ceiling, housing leather-bound volumes and '80s encyclopedias. Dusty armchairs beckon, surrounded by the musky scent of aged paper.

rooms.name: Bedroom
rooms.long_description: In an '80s bedroom of the mansion, a four-poster bed with a canopy takes center stage. Floral-patterned wallpaper envelops the room, and sunlight filters through lacy curtains. A vanity adorned with perfume bottles stands as a testament to past beautification rituals.

rooms.name: Attic
rooms.description: You see the Attic with endless cobwebs and dust everywhere
rooms.long_description: Dust-covered trunks and forgotten relics gather beneath eaves. Faded cardboard boxes, remnants of a bygone era, hold vintage clothes and forgotten memorabilia. Shafts of light pierce through cobweb-laden windows, illuminating a silent attic that guards the nostalgia of yesteryears.

rooms.name: Dungeon
rooms.description: You enter the stoned Dungeon as you hear drips of water from the surface
rooms.long_description: Beneath the mansion, an ominous '80s dungeon lurks in shadow. Stone walls echo with the past, chains hang from the ceiling, and a rusted iron door conceals secrets. Dim candlelight flickers, revealing forgotten instruments of restraint and a cold, damp atmosphere that holds the weight of untold mysteries.

rooms.name: Ritual Room
rooms.description: You see the Ritual Room and a cold breeze passes you.
rooms.long_description: Within the mansion, a ritual room lies shrouded in mystique. Crimson velvet drapes adorn the walls, framing an ornate altar bathed in flickering candlelight. Mysterious symbols are etched on the floor, and antique artifacts hint at arcane practices.
rooms.ending_room_outro: You have released the demon... Your soul has been devoured
